title: (x) slender sans serif Clear Water logo - Allise {Jean}
author: bessd1

comments.content:
This is a tough one. It's mostly a sans serif, but it looks like there are serif-like flares at the stroke ends. Having it all-caps doesn't help much either. I haven't been able to spot it in the Big Yellow (FontBook), so that suggests post-1998, or a relatively obscure foundry.

I'm stumped so far.

- Mike Yanega

'Squooshed' [Aperto](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419091649/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/calligraphics/aperto/) might be pretty close.

- Mike Yanega

... nice guess, Mike.  
But I think this one is Ethan Dunham's (Fonthead) Allise ...

Nice catch Jean! I have just about all the Fonthead collection, but I clearly don't _know_ them all. You can see the font [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419091649/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fonthead/allise/).

- Mike Yanega
